name: (a) speedrun game 2: the worsening
description:
HEY! YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THIS GAME!

Welcome to the land of speedrunning! In here you will feel so many emotions, you might buy a wagyu knife just to stab the wall.
NO SAVING YET

6 levels. 1 man. who is a stickman. with a hole in his face. Can you do it?

oh ye also try finding the secret levels in all the levels(except  6)
